text: Okayama often means Okayama, Okayama, the capital city of Okayama Prefecture in Japan. It may also mean: ==Locations== *Okayama Castle, a castle in the city of Okayama *Okayama Domain, a Japanese feudal domain of the Edo period *Okayama Prefecture, a prefecture in Japan ==Education== *Okayama University, a national university ==Sports== *Fagiano Okayama, a football (soccer) club ==Other== * 2084 Okayama, a main-belt asteroid discovered in 1935 by S. Arend * , also known as Kang Il-Sung (), a Japanese football (soccer) player
title: Okayama
